snippet: Strong criticism of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. by former Defense Secretary Robert M. Gates recalls his tough battles with Congress in 1987 and 1991 over his nomination as C.I.A. director.
abstract: Congressional Memo; strong criticism of Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr by former Defense Sec Robert M Gates in his memoir Duty: Memoirs of a Secretary at War recalls his tough battles with Congress in 1987 and 1991 over his nomination as CIA director.
lead_paragraph: Strong criticism of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. by former Defense Secretary Robert M. Gates recalls his tough battles with Congress in 1987 and 1991 over his nomination as C.I.A. director.

headline.main: Years Before His Bipartisan Luster, a Rough Reception for Gates
headline.print_headline: Years Before His Bipartisan Luster, a Rough Reception for Gates
